resources.string: This application has purpose to make kids learning language for Fun

To develop a game application for kids, the user interface has to be easy and easy to use, not too complcate following this, there are a picture and effect that developer has to use additional software to create and edit which needs to has knowledge in this tools. In the other hand, the storage of infornation in the application should be on online for application stole authentication and data set which developer must have a knowledge of cloud storage which developer choose in this project.
